doc:
Gladys Egan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gladys_Egan 0 Gladys Egan was an American child actress during the silent film era. She appeared in 104 films, including many productions by D. W. Griffith, between 1908 and 1914. Gladys_Egan was an_American_child_actress during the_silent_film_era . She appeared in 104_films , including many_productions by D._W._Griffith , between 1908_and_1914 .
